title: problems with my pixel 2 xl. camera doesnt work
content:
i have problems with google pixel 2 xl.  camera does not work.  it starts up but I only see a black screen.  and then the application is closed.  the camera has not worked for a week, both the main camera and the front camera do not work.  I tried all the methods described on the official forum.  how do i fix my camera?

All problems started after December 9, later than I installed android 11. 

Google pixel 2 xl, 358034084140562 imei 

What can I do with my problem?
